definition: to attack with a bladed weapon
to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: I was cursed while using it to cut down monsters.
sentences.chinese: 我用這把劍砍殺妖魔的時候中了魔咒。

sentences.english: And I have no weapon capable of slaying a monster.
sentences.chinese: 我還有一些私人的砍殺需要處理。

sentences.english: The hacking and slashing will begin later this year, so be a little more patient.
sentences.chinese: 砍殺將在今年晚些時候開始，所以請稍微有點耐心。

sentences.english: You can now ride toward enemies and slash them on each side.
sentences.chinese: 現在你可以乘馬靠近對敵人後在單側砍殺他們。

sentences.english: Against the headsman's hacking all the way.
